message.content:
cs.MA, cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper discusses a verification methodology for analysing the decision-making component in agent-based hybrid systems. This involves exploring agent-based logical components and developing a model checking technique for such components. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.MA (Multiagent Systems). The paper also discusses the use of program model checkers to verify the implementation of decision-making in hybrid autonomous systems, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also mentions the separation of logical decision-making into a separate, discrete component, which relates to cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science). The paper also discusses the limitations of traditional hybrid automata based modelling and verification techniques, which relates to cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper discusses the analysis of the continuous part of the hybrid system, which falls under cs.SY (Systems and Control).
